meanings.definition: (Latin) genitive singular of balteus (belt, girdle, sword-belt)
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) genitive singular of balteus (belt, girdle, sword-belt)

usage_notes.explanation: In Latin, balteus refers to a belt, especially a sword belt. 'Baltei' is the genitive singular form, often used to indicate possession or relationship.

readability_explanation.text: This is a Latin word, primarily relevant in historical or academic contexts.
